bioconda.name: bioconductor-tximport
bioconda.summary: Import and summarize transcript-level estimates for transcript- and gene-level analysis

biotools.summary: An R/Bioconductor package that imports transcript-level abundance, estimated counts and transcript lengths, and summarizes into matrices for use with downstream gene-level analysis packages.

bioschemas.name: tximport
bioschemas.summary: An R/Bioconductor package that imports transcript-level abundance, estimated counts and transcript lengths, and summarizes into matrices for use with downstream gene-level analysis packages.

galaxy.summary: Wrapper for the Bioconductor package tximport
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: An R/Bioconductor package that imports transcript-level abundance, estimated counts and transcript lengths, and summarizes into matrices for use with downstream gene-level analysis packages.
